item.title: Bill Withers - Lovely Day - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Lovely Day by Bill Withers from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A♯m7, A♯maj7, Cm, C♯m7, C♯maj7, Dm, D♯, F.

item.title: Smokey Robinson & The Miracles - Mickey's Monkey - Key of C - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Mickey's Monkey by Smokey Robinson & The Miracles from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: C, F.

item.title: Stevie Wonder - Faith - Key of G - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Faith by Stevie Wonder from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: C7, D7, G7.

item.title: Queen Naija - Butterflies - Key of G - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Butterflies by Queen Naija from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: Dmaj7, Em7, F♯m, Gmaj7.

item.title: The Commitments - Mustang Sally - Key of C - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Mustang Sally by The Commitments from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: C, F, G7.

item.title: Stevie Wonder - Isn't She Lovely - Key of C - Daniel Simmons
item.description: Play along video for the song Isn't She Lovely by Stevie Wonder from the channel Daniel Simmons. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D7, E7, F, G.

item.title: War - Why Can't We Be Friends? - Key of F - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Why Can't We Be Friends? by War from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, B♭, C, C7, E7, Em, F, G, G7, Gm.

item.title: War - Why Can't We Be Friends? - Baritone Ukulele - Key of F - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Why Can't We Be Friends? by War from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, B♭, C, C7, E7, Em, F, G, G7, Gm.

item.title: Bill Withers - Lovely Day - Key of F - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Lovely Day by Bill Withers from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: B♭m7, B♭maj7, Cm7, C♯maj7, Dm7, E♭, F.

item.title: Gene Chandler - Duke Of Earl - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Duke Of Earl by Gene Chandler from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, G.
